thread.title: Subaru’s Plan to Woo Americans: A Roomy SUV With 19 Cup Holders

author: Chester Dawson
title: Subaru’s Plan to Woo Americans: A Roomy SUV With 19 Cup Holders
text:
Subaru Corp. has become one of the world’s most profitable car companies by selling Japanese-inspired wagons to American buyers with unconventional tastes.
Now, with its dependence on the U.S. market increasing, the Tokyo-based auto maker is launching the Ascent, an eight-seater sport-utility vehicle that it hopes will appeal to middle America’s infatuation with larger and heavier cars.
Two-thirds... RELATED VIDEO Subaru Unveils SUV Concept in Detroit WSJ’s Dan Neil took a look at the new VIZIV-7, an SUV concept from Subaru, at the 2017 North American International Auto Show. (Originally published Jan. 10, 2017
